canConnect.message: You can connect your PREreview profile to your ORCID profile.

willAddPrereviews.message: We’ll add your PREreviews to your ORCID profile.

sendYouToOrcid.message: We’ll send you to ORCID, where they will ask you to log in and grant PREreview access to your profile there. You may have already done these steps, and ORCID will return you to PREreview.

cannotConnectProfile.message: Sorry, we can’t connect your profile

youDeniedAccess.message: You have denied PREreview access to your ORCID profile.

unableToConnect.message: We’re unable to connect your profile right now.
